document.full_text: petra kvitova claimed her third title of the year when she upset fourth seed victoria azarenka 7-6 6-4 in the final of the madrid open on sunday.
document.title: kvitova upsets azarenka to take madrid open title
lines_and_colors: petra kvitova claimed her third title of the year when she upset fourth seed victoria azarenka 7-6 6-4 in the final of the madrid open on sunday.
